Lu Ming and the rest did not interrupt the conversation between the white- haired elder and the ancestral Dragon. The Titan longhorn beetle also kept its mouth shut. This was a martial God. Only the ancestral Dragon, who was also a martial God, had the right to speak to such a person.

Otherwise, if it wasn’t for the ancestral Dragon, he probably wouldn’t even want to see them.

that’s right. We’ll work together. You can help us enter the netherworld Island and we’ll split the treasures we get on the island 50 – 50. It’s beneficial to everyone. How about it? ”

Zulong said.

“Yellow Springs Island?”

The white-haired old man was stunned for a moment. Then, he sighed and said, it seems that you all came from beyond the heavens. Time passes so quickly. The tribulations have passed so quickly!

The white-haired old man’s voice was filled with complicated emotions.

The white-haired old man seemed to think of something, and after a long while, he said, you can go now. My yellow spring sect has no interest in yellow spring Island!

“Not interested?”

Zu Long’s eyes narrowed. Lu Ming and the rest were shocked. Was he going to fail?

fellow Daoist, how about this? as long as you do us a favor, all the treasures we get on the yellow Springs Island will belong to you. How about it? ”

Zu long was unwilling to give up and continued.

I said, I’m not interested. See the guest out!

The white-haired old man waved his sleeve and turned to leave.

“Everyone, please!”

The middle-aged man from before waved his hand.

Lu Ming and the group looked a little pale.

He didn’t expect that the people of the yellow spring sect didn’t care about the treasures on the island at all.

If they couldn’t get help from the netherworld sect, how could they fight against the netherworld Empire and the divine ancestor?

The Titan longhorn beetle and the others were anxious, but they couldn’t think of anything.

“Hey, let’s go!”

Zu long was also helpless. He turned around and walked down the mountain.

Soon, they arrived at the foot of the mountain.

if you don’t want to help, then don’t help. At most, we’ll go and save them ourselves. It’s just death!

The Titan longhorn beetle cursed, feeling extremely unhappy.

However, Lu Ming stopped and continued to study the stone tablet in front of the yellow spring sect.

The more he looked at it, the more he felt that the stone tablet looked familiar.

“That’s right, that token …”

Suddenly, Lu Ming thought of the token. With a thought, a token appeared in his hand.

This token was the one that he and dandan had obtained in the core area of the void God Island.

The appearance of this token was very similar to the stone tablet in front of the yellow spring sect’s Mountain Gate.

Previously, the stone tablet was covered in moss. Lu Ming felt that it looked familiar. Now that he took a closer look, Lu Ming finally remembered.

Buzzzzzz!

Just as Lu Ming took out the token, the stone tablet in front of the mountain Gate of the yellow spring sect suddenly trembled. The ‘yellow’ character suddenly emitted a dazzling radiance.

At the same time, the token in Lu Ming’s hand also vibrated, and light flowed out continuously.

The next moment, Lu Ming was shocked to discover that a word had suddenly appeared in the middle of the token. It was a ‘yellow’ word.

Lu Ming was shocked. Ever since he had obtained this token, he had studied it a lot but he had not found anything. There were no words in the middle of the token either.

But now, a ‘yellow’ character had suddenly appeared. This way, the token and the stone tablet looked exactly the same.

The ancestral Dragon, the nine lives devilish silkworm, the Titan longhorn beetle, and the others were also extremely shocked, not understanding what was going on.

At this moment, a figure flashed. The white-haired old man reappeared.

He looked at the token in Lu Ming’s hand in shock. Then, he looked at Lu Ming and said, ” “The underworld token. How did you get it? how did you get it?” “Yellow Springs token?”

Lu Ming’s heart skipped a beat. It turned out that this token was called the underworld token.

“Senior, this token was obtained by this junior from a void God Island …”

Lu Ming said.

“Void God Island?”

“Tell me, who gave you the token? what does he look like?” the white-haired old man asked, puzzled.

Lu Ming immediately described the appearance of the statue on the void God Island.

“So it’s him, so it’s him, it’s heaven’s will!”

The white-haired elder sighed and looked at Lu Ming, back then, that person did us a favor. We gave him this token and promised that if someone came to our sect with this token, we would help them unconditionally!

“What?”

Lu Ming, zu long, and the others were overjoyed when they heard this.

Help him unconditionally once? Then, he could ask for help from the netherworld sect.

“What’s your name?”

The white-haired old man asked.

“Junior is Lu Ming!”

Lu Ming said.

yes, Lu Ming. If you have any requests, feel free to let me know!

The white-haired old man said.

“Senior, it’s like this …”

Immediately, Lu Ming briefly explained the grudges between the heaven realm and the evil god tribe, then he talked about the situation here.

I ask for the help of the seniors of the yellow spring sect to fight against the yellow spring Empire and enter the yellow spring Island!

Lu Ming made his request.

I’m afraid it’s very difficult for us to enter the netherworld Island alone!

The white-haired old man said.

“Alt? What’s going on?”

Lu Ming was surprised.

you don’t know yet, right? the entrance to the netherworld Island is guarded by a group of puppets. There are four puppets in this group, which are equivalent to the martial God Realm. Therefore, we can’t get in with our strength alone!

The white-haired old man said.

“Four war god Realm puppets?”

Lu Ming, the ancestral Dragon, the Titan longhorn beetle, and the rest looked at each other.

This Yellow Springs Island was too terrifying. There were four martial God Realm puppets at the entrance. They were martial gods!

One had to know that there were only two martial gods in the evil god Realm and heaven realm, and they were both injured.

Lu Ming finally understood why the divine ancestor of the non-human race had not entered netherworld Island. It was because he could not.

therefore, if we want to enter the yellow Springs Island, we must cooperate with the yellow Springs Empire!

The white-haired old man said.

“Cooperation?”

Lu Ming and the rest were in deep thought.

“Senior, please help us save our people!”

Lu Ming said.

that’s fine. I’ll gather some people and then set off!

The white-haired elder said. Then, he turned around and disappeared into the yellow spring sect.

“Brother Lu Ming, you’re amazing!”

Qing Cang and the others were overjoyed.

He did not expect that he would be able to get help from the netherworld sect with Lu Ming’s token.

Lu Ming sighed secretly. Life was really wonderful and unpredictable.

He had not expected that the token he had obtained on the void God Island would be of such great use in the yellow Springs world.

This token would probably be able to change the entire situation.

Not long after, a large number of experts flew out from the mountain peak of the yellow spring sect.

Next to the white-haired old man, there was another white-haired old woman, who was also at the martial God Realm.

The group flew towards the capital of the netherworld Kingdom.
